PORTAL 2!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Onde sua inteligencia sera testada com o uso da portal gun™ criada pela aperture Technologies.
Divirta-se descobrindo que vc e mais anta que sua aparência diz.
E seja instruído por uma esfera mais legal que vc e depois por uma maquina gigante que não se importa se vc vai morrer ou não!

Compre agora essa bagaça e mostre pra sua mãe que vc não usa seu cérebro somente para jogos violentos!

An all-round improvement on it's predecessor, Portal 2 brings back the Portal Gun and it's head-wrecking mechanics as well as adding a few elements of it's own. Stephen Merchant steals the show as Wheatley, an energetic, if somewhat hapless A.I. core, while Ellen McClain is again brilliant as GLaDOS. Portal 2 adds campaign length without feeling stretched, a few more fleeting glances at the pre-GLaDOS Aperture and retains it's stimulating puzzles to make it a worthy succesor to Portal. Not as good as it's hype would suggest, but still an excellent game.
I love this game! played 66 houres in total! :D
Words can't describe this game, it is one of the best games ever made and the storyline will make you want to never stop playing
Trol
Best Valve game if you ask me
cool
spela det här spelet om dy gillar tanke spel och C-O spel !

Portal 2 is a fantstic puzzle game, with its great storyline charactors and enviroments. Although the game and its DLC were excellent, on some computers the game seems to be crashing quite often. this useually happens in game at save points, weather your on singleplayer, or on community maps. The Perpetual Testing Initiative is amazing, as well as free, and I would definatly recomend this game.

Сиквел известной Portal - portal 2 оставил за собой много впечатлений, хороших и плохих. Из плюсов отмечю отличный синглплеер, который рассказывает то, что произошло в этой части, не без спойлеров, конечно( Лучше сначала пройти 1ую игру). К нам присоидиняется модуль с британским аккцентом( озвученным в русской версии не плохо, замечу) и мы... А, ладно, это уже спойлеры. Ах, да. Появился редактор уровней. Как только всесь сюжет прошли(А может быть еще и ко-оп), открывайте мастерскую и загружайте карты!
 Из минусов:  Шляпы. Вы серьезно? Покупать шляпы? Для роботов? Ах да, простите, еще и камуфляж... При этом на торговой площадке нет раздела portal 2 и шляпы стоят ПО 5 БАКСОВ! И да, шляпы НЕ ВЫПАДАЮТ. ВООБЩЕ. Некоторые еще говорят, что минус-мультиплеер на двоих. Я в каком-то смысле, считаю это даже плюсом, ибо представте сервер, где 12(Ну ладно, пусть будет 6) людей сидят и решают головоломки с порталами. Я понимаю, убивать роботов в 6 человек, или годня там в 5ром.. НО ГОЛОВОЛОМКУ! (А если друзья не могут, что с 5 идиотами(Привет, Уитли) играть?)...
Моя оценка игре: 6.9\10. Только из за доната без выпадения предметов.

The list goes on. A must play for anyone who has played the first one or is looking for a fun, yet challenging game.

While not as open as the last game, definitely an improvement in many other ways. Go through story mode for a blast always worth replaying, or the co-op mode if you and a friend have the game, both equally challenging, although the co-op mode more so for the fun of griefing :P

Realmente un gran juego, unico en su tipo, en primera persona con pistola de portales usando grandes espacios y el cuerpo para resolver enormes puzles y desafios donde las maquinas son tan cinicas como los humanos. Excelente calidad grafica y jugabilidad, te mantiene unido al argumento y ademas podes ir descubriendo secretos. El editor de camaras de pruebas es excelente y poder compartir las creaciones con la comunidad de la un gran potencial y largas horas de juego!! En coop es muy gracioso y plantea desafios mas complejos. Lejos uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, ojala venga la parte 3.

Fajna gra :) Storyline jest ciekawy, jeśli ktoś nie grał w Portal (1) to nic! Szybko można zrozumieć o co chodzi. Kooperacja jest ciekawa, ba! najlepsza, oraz idealny komentarz naszych poczynień przez pewien komputer nazwany [spoiler] GLaDOS [/spoiler]
Wszystko tutaj jest ciekawe, nawet bardzo. Polecam grę dla wszystkich. Połączenie takiego Sci-Fi z logiką i troszkę przygodówką.

POLECAM 10/10

Интересно, почему у меня нет друзей без Доты, но полно без второго Портала? Игра шедевральная. Большой скачок в плане геймплея и головоломок по сравнению с первой частью. Появился более развитый сюжет. ГлаДОС всё так же прекрасна. А финальная песня великолепна. И ах да, именно благодаря этой игре я здесь, на стиме :3

    Portal 2 является одной из немногих игр, в которую действительно можно влюбится. Пройдя её, меня не покидало чувство печали, ведь прощаться с таким творением очень сложно. На протяжении всего игрового процесса вам предстоит проходить различные испытания, слушать забавные диалоги, смеяться, и наконец наблюдать за великолепными декорациями. Стоит отдать должное Valve, за добросовестное отношение к этому проекту, в результате которого на свет появился такой гениальный шедевр...

Both Portal games are a must if you want a bit of a challenge :) The story is amazing across both games, and it is probably the most original game I've ever played :P If you want something a bit different, and want to use your brain - you NEED this game :3
Ce jeu est génial ! Je n'est trouver aucun bug ! Impréssionant !
fun addicting game!)

Simply amazing. Play on sequel to Portal 1 or, at least, read the story, but I would say for you to play the first game. When I played the first I thought it was the best puzzle game ever, until Portal 2. There's nothing to compare. They made an amazing story that you really get into it; the visuals are simple but stunning (the game is very light for what it looks like, Half-Life 2 engine is superb); there is NO VIOLENCE, the olny guns on the game are of the turrets but you can't see any blood or somthing like that, making it playable by any human beeing in the planet.
This is not a game that some people like others not, this is the simple case where the people who played are amezed with it and the people who didn't play don't know what they're missing. Never heard of one single person who played and stoped on the middle of the game, you simply have on your mind that one puzzle you must overcome and you won't rest until it, and this feeling is delightful. Only one thing down about that: When the game is over, you feel a part of you is not with you anymore. And that's why there are the extra levels made by the players, that are as amazing as the game.
Игра просто шедевр!

Incredible game, loved the humour, the levels looked amazing and the challenges were pretty awesome. Some problems with stuttering when using Vsync, but this did nothing to dampen the exceptional game. Would really recommend.
Mi juego favorito
If you don't already have it get. witty, fun and challenging at times.

This game is easily one of the best, if not THE best, puzzle games out there. 
The puzzles are hard and challenging, but not so hard, that you would rage quit. And the fact, that this game has a level editor and a workshop makes it now bazillion times better. There are some great Community-created levels. But the best part (or parts, rather) is the humour and the best villian of all times- GlaDOS. You will just love to hate her and yet love her at the same time. 

But if you played the previous one, you already know all of this. 

So what are you sitting here for ?! Put your Companion Cube on the 'Buy' button and of to Aperture Labs!

Kolejna odsłona Portala. Valve jednak mnie nie zawiodło, a wręcz zaimponowało. Wszystki pokoje testowe dopracowane, łamigłowki zręcznościowe na których przesiedziałem sporo czasu i wreszcie sarkastyczne teksty Glados w kierunku mej osoby.
No i oczywiście Whaetly, który mądrością nie błyszczy ,a humor po nad wszystko. Dodano również system co-op. Sterujemy 2 robotami , które możemy zobaczyć na końcu gry. Czysta przyjemność przechodzenia pokoji z twoim przyjacielem. No jak to mówią co 2 głowy to nie 1. Gra dostaje ode mnie 10/10. Liczę na więcej od Valve w przyszłości.
The community chambers make this game insanely replayable. I highly recommend designed for danger and 12 Angry tests
Awesome game! Way more satisfying to beat than the original because of the harder puzzles, longer storyline, & far supererior dark humor. A must have for every Steam member!
One of the best games I've ever played, with amazing characters and great fun!

If you don't have this game, get it. It's worth it. If you don't like it I think there is something wrong with you.

This is how you do a sequel. Take the impressive portal mechanics from the first game and add tons of new puzzles involving gels, springs, cubes and spheres, add in a deeper plot and multiplayer and you have one of the best games of the decade.
Literally the only flaw this game has is that there wasn't more of it. This is one of those games which approaches the platonic ideal of "good game." I guarantee people will be playing Portal 2 in 20 years and still making mods and campaigns for it. This is a game for the ages.
